title: Spicy Spanish chorizo and vegetable stew
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '4 celery sticks, chopped', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 red pepper, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '1/2 a chorizo, diced (or more to taste)', '1 litre chicken stock', '2 tins tomatoes', '1 tin chickpeas', 'salt and black pepper', '1 tablespoon sugar, or to taste', '1 large pinch smoked paprika', '1/2 savoy cabbage', '1 packet garlic bread, to serve', '1 small tin sweetcorn']
